summary: Research completed for wezterm tab numbering mismatch. TTS uses global tab_id ordering while wezterm displays per-window tab_index. Solution: modify .dotfiles/config/wezterm.lua format-tab-title to compute global position using wezterm.mux.all_windows().

artifacts.summary: Research report analyzing TTS vs wezterm tab numbering mismatch with 3 solution options and implementation recommendation
